data.name: RPGScenery - Farm Countryside Scene
data.detailed_description:
Crossing the creek, you see a long straight dirt road edged by a neat wooden fence while the eye can see. On the other side of the fence, in the shade of ancient oaks, lies a lovely farmhouse. The wind carries a mouth-watering scent to you from the direction of the building. Behind the house lies a vegetable garden and a pig farm, and beyond that is a large barn, a windmill and a semi-finished building.

This DLC contains 9 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
